name: Comprehensive Eye Exams
description: Learn more about what problems can be spotted with an eye exam, whatâ€™s involved in a comprehensive exam, and special considerations for kids and contacts.

name: Orthokeratology (CRT & VST)
description: Orthokeratology, or ortho-k is the process of reshaping the eye with specially-designed rigid gas permeable contact lenses.

name: Pediatric Eye Exams
description: According to experts, 80% of learning is visual, which means that if your child is having difficulty seeing clearly, his or her learning can be affected.

name: LASIK & Refractive Surgery Co-Management
description: If you're ready for an alternative to glasses and/or contacts look to us for co-management of LASIK, cataract, and other ocular surgery.

name: Astigmatism Diagnosis & Treatment
description: Astigmatism is a very common eye condition that's easily corrected with eyeglasses or contact lenses and on some occasions, surgery.

name: Management of Ocular Diseases
description: I diagnose and manage ocular diseases such as Glaucoma, Macular Degeneration, Diabetic Retinopathy and Cataracts.
